text: Jois is a make of Indian brandy, manufactured by Amrut Distilleries, most popular in the states of Kerala and Karnataka. It is part of Amrut's Indian Made Foreign Liquor (IMFL) portfolio. ==See also== * Amrut Distilleries * Amrut * List of Indian beverages ==References== Category:Brandies Category:Alcoholic drink brands
title: Bejois (brandy)
